What is (are) Treatment Methods for Kidney Failure: Peritoneal Dialysis ?,"Peritoneal dialysis is a treatment for kidney failure that uses the lining of your abdomen, or belly, to filter your blood inside your body. Doctors call this lining the peritoneum. A doctor will place a
